commit message:
add contraint to update status & percent complete when a checklist is changed (works in edit mode too)
implements #66
At present this can not be disabled. We're waiting for user feedback in this matter.
fix checkbox style in details view - lesson: don't use application context when you don't have to ...

don't set task to 'needs action' when the last checkbox is unticked in the checklist. Instead just keep the current state.
Just because no sub-tasks are done, it doesn't mean not work is in process.

set all-day date when all-day is selected
fixes #40

Update strings.xml

Added missing strings for new functions

Merge pull request #70 from nixprosoft/patch-4

Update Russian strings.xml
revise checklist mode and combine it with regular descriptions
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dmfs/tasks into OSE
show checked checklist items in lighter gray
